rules_text:
When Scavenging Hydra enters, create X 1/1 green Hydra Tentacle creature tokens.
Sacrifice a creature: Scavenging Hydra must be blocked this turn if able. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: [i]Cannibalization is far from unheard of on Hwel.There always exists something more extreme for every circumstance though.[/i]
